title: Romeo Attam Pottaal Lyrics Mr Romeo
stanzas:
Romeo Attam Pottaal Song Lyrics Mr Romeo
Singer: Hariharan , Udit Narayan
Lyrics: Vairamuthu / Vaali

Romeo Attam Pottaal
Suthum boomi suththaadhe
Ayyaho kundu sattiyil
Kudhirai otta koodaadhe

Yaelayai thookki eriyaadhe
ezhumbugal illaamal
Vaangi vandha 
Dhegam idhu
Rubber pola sonnabadi
Thulludhu paar.

Romeo Attam Pottaal
Suthum boomi suththaadhe
Ayyaho kundu sattiyil
Kudhirai otta koodaadhe
Yaelayai thookki eriyaadhe

Nilave nilave 
Nilave nilave
Adadaa jadhi 
kudhirai idhu
Ennai thaan thaedi
Thirigiradhu

Kaluthin melae 
Nilakkal kanden
Kaluthin kelae
Puraakkal kanden

Oru kannil paarthaale
Oru vaaram elamaatten
Iru kannil paarthaalo
Enna aagum sollamaatten

Indha roattu thamarai
Enna vilaiyo.
Ival kannil midhappadhu
Enna kalaiyo

Sirikkum podhu
Silirthu kondaen
Ival sindhiya sirippai
Madiyil yendhi kondaen.

Romeo Attam Pottaal
Suthum boomi suththaadhe
Ayyaho kundu sattiyil
Kudhirai otta koodaadhe
Yaelayai thookki eriyaadhe.

Enaku Raja machcham
Irukku inimel
Yogam uchcham irukku.

Kaattile yaeri
Ulaavum varuven
Kai kaalai neetti
Nilavai thoduven.

Yaarayum thoosai pola
Dhutcham endru ennaadhe
Thirugani illai endraal
Raile illai maravaadhe

Ennai roattil 
Erindhadhu unadhu vidhi.
Naan saalai 
Manidharin piravi vidhi

Pirakkum munne
Vizhithuk kondaen
Annai karuvinil 
Purandadhum nadam
Thodangi vitten.

Romeo Attam Pottaal
Suthum boomi suththaadhe
Ayyaho kundu sattiyil
Kudhirai otta koodaadhe

Yaelayai thookki eriyaadhe

ezhumbugal illaamal
Vaangi vandha 
Dhegam idhu
Rubber pola sonnabadi
Thulludhu paar.

Romeo Attam Pottaal
Suthum boomi suththaadhe
Ayyaho kundu sattiyil
Kudhirai otta koodaadhe
Yaelayai thookki eriyaadhe
